pepper.framework.application module¶

class pepper.framework.application.Application(backend)[source]¶

Bases: pepper.framework.abstract.component.AbstractComponent

The Application class is at the base of every robot application. It keeps track of events from different Components and allows for Intentions to be build in top of it.

class pepper.framework.application.Intention(application)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Intention class is at the base of more involved robot applications. They build on top of applications an allow for switching of robot contexts.
